name: Veil (RoboDoig)
description:
Veil is an multiplayer puzzle/strategy game that takes place in a semi-persistent online world. Moves that you make in Veil have consequences not just on the game board, but also in the world outside the board. Players must choose to work together or compete to solve and complete puzzles.

Please note that the server scaling for the game is currently restricted while it is in development, if you have trouble finding a match please get in contact.

Additionally, if you are unable to register an account - or you would prefer not to input personal information such as email addresses in the game client - please reach out and I can provide temporary credentials to access the game.

ESC - Options menu

W/S - Zoom in/out

M - Shows available moves when hovering over piece

Right-click - Piece description

Acknowledgements:

Music: Spencer Noble
